Package com.example.appointment

Class CustomerComboBoxModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.appointment.CustomerComboBoxModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
SQLControllerInterface
public class CustomerComboBoxModel extends Object implements SQLControllerInterface
A Singleton class that manages the combo boxes for the customer controllers enabling the combo box on the two customer scenes to have accurate Country and Division data.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CustomerComboBoxModel getInstance(ConnectionModel connectionModel) throws IOException, SQLException
      A method that returns an instance of the CustomerComboBoxModel.
      Parameters:
      connectionModel - Passes in the connection model object into the customer combo box class to enable database connectivity, and language features.
      Returns:
      An instance of the CustomerComboBoxModel. If one does not already exist it will make a new object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.
      SQLException - SQLException If a SQL database error occurs.

    • setCountriesComboBoxHashMap

      public void setCountriesComboBoxHashMap() throws SQLConnectionDroppedException
      A method that sets up a HashMap that stores the country ID's as a key, and a list of the country's states or provinces as a value. It retrieves this information from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLConnectionDroppedException - If a SQL error occurs that disrupts the connection to the database.

    • getCountriesComboBoxHashMap

      public HashMap<Integer,String> getCountriesComboBoxHashMap()
      A method that returns the HashMap of all the available countries.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of all the countries that are available from the database.

    • setDivisionsComboBoxHashMap

      public void setDivisionsComboBoxHashMap(int countryID) throws SQLException
      A method that connects to the database and sets up the division combo box so that all of its divisions are appropriate for the given country. For example if you select the United States, you should get a combo box listing US states. If you select Canada, you should get a selection of provinces that are actually in Canada.
      Parameters:
      countryID - Passes in the ID of the selected country.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • getDivisionsComboBoxHashMap

      public HashMap<Integer,String> getDivisionsComboBoxHashMap()
      A method that returns a HashMap of all the available divisions.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of available divisions.
